org.mindswap.owls
Interface OWLSVersionTranslator

All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericVersionTranslator, OWLSTranslator_1_0, OWLSTranslator_1_1
public interface OWLSVersionTranslator

Transforms an older version of an OWL-S ontology to the default version that is supported by the API. Usually, this would be the latest version of OWL-S.

Method Summary
 boolean canTranslate(OWLOntology ontology)
           
 java.lang.String getVersion()
           
 OWLOntology translate(OWLOntology inputOnt, OWLOntology outputOnt)
          Translates the statements in the input ontology to the default OWL-S version that is supported by the API and adds all translated statements to the output ontology.
 

Method Detail

getVersion

java.lang.String getVersion()
Returns:
The OWL-S version this translator reads.

canTranslate

boolean canTranslate(OWLOntology ontology)
Parameters:
ontology - The ontology subject to be translated.
Returns:
true if this translator can translate the given ontology.

translate

OWLOntology translate(OWLOntology inputOnt,
                      OWLOntology outputOnt)
Translates the statements in the input ontology to the default OWL-S version that is supported by the API and adds all translated statements to the output ontology.

Imported ontologies of the input ontology (if any) are added to the output ontology in untranslated form, i.e., without any changes.

Parameters:
inputOnt - The ontology subject to be translated.
outputOnt - The ontology that will be added by all translated statements.
Returns:
The translated ontology. Usually, it would be the outputOnt. In case this translator actually does not need to do any translation at all, it may also return the inputOnt as is.
